item.title: Creating a website with GAE, Travis, and Jekyll
item.description: Recently, I decided that I wanted to change the look of my website. I'm not really a web developer so I wanted a simple setup. I like Markdown, especially the way Github renders markdown documentation. Feel free to modify/check out the source for this website. Setup Setting up Jekyll is pretty simple - it's a Ruby gem so you have to install Ruby. I have Homebrew, so it was as simple as
